markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Energize Wings](/Feats.aspx?ID=2639) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Morph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=113" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=134" />
<trait label="Sprite" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=238" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 131 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per hour

**Prerequisites**
[Evanescent Wings](/Feats.aspx?ID=2632)

</column>

---

You stoke your magic to energize your wings, temporarily transforming them into glowing, majestic forms. For 1 minute, you gain a fly Speed of 30 feet.

<title level="2">Energize Wings leads to...</title>
[Hero's Wings](/Feats.aspx?ID=2643)
name: Energize Wings
